public static Class<?>[] types() {
        return new Class<?>[] {
            File.class,
            URL.class,
            URI.class,
            Class.class,
            JavaType.class,
            Currency.class,
            Pattern.class,
            Locale.class,
            Charset.class,
            TimeZone.class,
            InetAddress.class,
            InetSocketAddress.class,
            StringBuilder.class,
        };
    }
